\date 12-1-2020
\author Remko Welling (pe1mew@pe1mew.nl)
\version See version history

## Dependancies

This node is using port 3 from the "Data processor KPN developer portal" node
that is decoded by the CayenneLPP decoder node.

template:
INSERT INTO Metingen(deviceID, datum, lux, temperatuur, luchtvochtigheid)
VALUES('{{payload.devID}}', now(), {{payload.lux}}, {{payload.temp}}, {{payload.hum}});
